Hello, world. Starting a new blog today!
Why blog?  I already publish a bunch of stuff on my Facebook profile, and wished that my posts get a home of their own. I feel like it. I had an unsuccessful Wordpress blog in 2007-2008, and want to try to make it better this time.  What blog? I plan on posting:
 Math stuff. Programming & technology stuff. Projects and stuff. Stuff I’ll copy from my past posts on Facebook.  Arbitrarily, some posts will be in English, and some in Hebrew.
How blog? For this blog, I chose Hugo. The reason I chose Hugo is that that’s what Shay Nehmad is using. ðŸ¤·
